original: @112b # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @112b # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: shr'i badzra yo gi n'i s'a dha na n'a ma /
analyzed: shr'i badzra yo gi n'i s'a dha na n'a ma /
translated: Śrī-vajrayoginīsādhana-nāma

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: dpal rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba /
analyzed: dpal rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba /
translated: The glorious Vajrayoginī Sādhana

original: dpal rdo rje rnal 'byor ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: dpal rdo rje rnal 'byor ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the glorious Vajrayoginī.

original: dpal ldan bde mchog thabs kyi gtso //
analyzed: dpal ldan bde mchog thabs kyi gtso //
translated: The glorious Cakrasaṃvara, the chief of methods,

original: gnyis med shes rab 'khor lor bcas //
analyzed: gnyis med shes rab 'khor lor bcas //
translated: Together with the wheel of nondual wisdom,

original: gus btud dpal ldan rnal 'byor ma'i //
analyzed: gus btud dpal ldan rnal 'byor ma'i //
translated: Having respectfully bowed to the glorious Vajrayoginī,

original: sgrub thabs rim pa bri bar bya //🔽dang ldan dbang dang dam tshig ldan //
analyzed: sgrub thabs rim pa bri bar bya // dang ldan dbang dang dam tshig ldan //
translated: I will write the stages of her sādhana.🔽A mantra practitioner who possesses the empowerments and commitments,

original: sgrub la dpa' ba'i sngags pa yis //
analyzed: sgrub la dpa' ba'i sngags pa yis //
translated: And is courageous in practice,

original: dur khrod la sogs dben pa'i gnas //
analyzed: dur khrod la sogs dben pa'i gnas //
translated: In a secluded place such as a charnel ground,

original: nyams dgar mchod pa'i rten bzhugs la //
analyzed: nyams dgar mchod pa'i rten bzhugs la //
translated: In a delightful place with the support of offerings,

original: stan bde ba la 'dug sems bya //
analyzed: stan bde ba la 'dug sems bya //
translated: Sitting on a comfortable seat, one should contemplate.

original: lhag pa'i lhar bsam hr'i: 'od las //
analyzed: lhag pa'i lhar bsam hr'i: 'od las //
translated: Thinking of the supreme deity, from the light of hriḥ,

original: bla ma dkyil 'khor spyan drangs la //
analyzed: bla ma dkyil 'khor spyan drangs la //
translated: The guru and maṇḍala are invited,

original: phyag dang mchod pa sngon 'gro bas //
analyzed: phyag dang mchod pa sngon 'gro bas //
translated: And having made offerings and prostrations beforehand,

original: sdig pa bshags pa la sogs bya //
analyzed: sdig pa bshags pa la sogs bya //
translated: One should confess misdeeds and so forth.

original: de rjes tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgom ;
analyzed: de rjes tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgom ;
translated: After that, one should meditate on the four abodes of Brahmā.

original: / kun kyang stong nyid rang bzhin bsam //
analyzed: / kun kyang stong nyid rang bzhin bsam //
translated: All of them are the nature of emptiness.

original: sngags 'dis brtan pa nyid du bya //
analyzed: sngags 'dis brtan pa nyid du bya //
translated: With this mantra, one should stabilize it:

original: aom sva bh'a ba shuddha: sarbba dharmm'a:sva bh'a ba shoddho& ham /
analyzed: aom sva bh'a ba shuddha: sarbba dharmm'a:sva bh'a ba shoddho& ham /
translated: Oṃ svabhāva śuddhaḥ sarvadharmaḥ svabhāva śodhaya aṃ haṃ.

original: slar yang ye shes ngo bor bstan //
analyzed: slar yang ye shes ngo bor bstan //
translated: Again, one should visualize the essence of wisdom:

original: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham /
analyzed: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham /
translated: Oṃ śūnyatā jñāna vajra svabhāva ātmako ’haṃ.

original: zhes bya rang bzhin dag pa las //
analyzed: zhes bya rang bzhin dag pa las //
translated: From the pure nature,

original: pam las padma nyi dkyil du //
analyzed: pam las padma nyi dkyil du //
translated: from the syllable paṃ arises a lotus in the sun maṇḍala,

original: ae yi rnam pa'i cha byad can //
analyzed: ae yi rnam pa'i cha byad can //
translated: in the form of the syllable e.

original: lha mo khams gsum kun las 'das //
analyzed: lha mo khams gsum kun las 'das //
translated: The goddess transcends the three realms.

original: dmigs pa rgya che gzhal yas khang //
analyzed: dmigs pa rgya che gzhal yas khang //
translated: The visualized object is the vast immeasurable palace.

original: sku gsung thugs kyi ngo bor bsgom //
analyzed: sku gsung thugs kyi ngo bor bsgom //
translated: One should meditate on the essence of body, speech, and mind.

original: de yi lte bar chos 'byung bsam //
analyzed: de yi lte bar chos 'byung bsam //
translated: In its center, one should visualize the source of phenomena,

original: padma nyi ma ro stengs su //
analyzed: padma nyi ma ro stengs su //
translated: on a lotus, sun, and corpse,

original: hr'i: yig byu ru dmar po 'dra //
analyzed: hr'i: yig byu ru dmar po 'dra //
translated: the syllable hrīḥ, like a red coral,

original: 'od zer spro bsdus slar bsams te //
analyzed: 'od zer spro bsdus slar bsams te //
translated: from which light radiates and returns.

original: zhal gnyis phyag gnyis gar stabs bzhugs //
analyzed: zhal gnyis phyag gnyis gar stabs bzhugs //
translated: One should visualize the goddess with two faces and two arms, dancing.🔽Her color is like the jasmine flower,

original: dza ba sindhu ra yi mdog / g-yas pas gri gug nam mkhar gdengs //
analyzed: dza ba sindhu ra yi mdog / g-yas pas gri gug nam mkhar gdengs //
translated: her right hand brandishes a flaying knife in the air,

original: de bzhin gzhan gyis ka p'a la //
analyzed: de bzhin gzhan gyis ka p'a la //
translated: Likewise, the other [face] is adorned with a kapāla

original: kha tv'am gis brgyan rnam par 'dzin //
analyzed: kha tv'am gis brgyan rnam par 'dzin //
translated: and a khaṭvāṅga.

original: g-yas pa phag gdong mkha' la spyod //🔽cig @113a * //
analyzed: g-yas pa phag gdong mkha' la spyod // cig @113a * //
translated: The right [face] is a pig face, flying in the sky,

original: shos khro mo'i zhal du bstan //
analyzed: shos khro mo'i zhal du bstan //
translated: and the other [face] is a wrathful face.

original: phyag rgya'i rim pas sku lus mdzes //
analyzed: phyag rgya'i rim pas sku lus mdzes //
translated: The body is beautified by the stages of the mudras,

original: mgo bo'i do shal rgyan dang ldan //
analyzed: mgo bo'i do shal rgyan dang ldan //
translated: adorned with a necklace of heads,

original: gar dgu'i ro ldan bsam par bya //
analyzed: gar dgu'i ro ldan bsam par bya //
translated: and one should imagine it endowed with the flavor of the nine expressions of dance.

original: yi ge gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs //
analyzed: yi ge gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs //
translated: It is empowered by the three syllables.🔽At the navel, heart, throat,

original: lte ba snying ga mgrin pa dang // dpral ba spyi gtsug yan lag la //
analyzed: lte ba snying ga mgrin pa dang // dpral ba spyi gtsug yan lag la //
translated: forehead, and crown,

original: rim par sngags 'di bsam par bya //
analyzed: rim par sngags 'di bsam par bya //
translated: one should imagine the mantra in stages.

original: aom bam / ham yom //
analyzed: aom bam / ham yom //
translated: Oṃ vaṃ, haṃ yoṃ,

original: hrim mom hrim hrim /
analyzed: hrim mom hrim hrim /
translated: hriṃ moṃ hriṃ hriṃ,

original: h'um h'um / phat phat /
analyzed: h'um h'um / phat phat /
translated: hūṃ hūṃ, phaṭ phaṭ.

original: go cha bgos te ye shes bstim //
analyzed: go cha bgos te ye shes bstim //
translated: Having donned the armor, one should absorb the gnosis.

original: dbang bskur mchod cing bstod pa bya //
analyzed: dbang bskur mchod cing bstod pa bya //
translated: One should confer empowerment, make offerings, and offer praise.

original: skyo na sngags 'di bzlas par bya //
analyzed: skyo na sngags 'di bzlas par bya //
translated: If one is tired, one should recite this mantra:

original: aom aom aom sarba buddha d'a ki n'i ye badzra warnna n'i ye h'um h'um h'um phat phat phat sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom aom aom sarba buddha d'a ki n'i ye badzra warnna n'i ye h'um h'um h'um phat phat phat sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ oṃ oṃ sarva buddha dakiniye vajra varṇaniye hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā.

original: de rjes gto ra mas mchod par bya //
analyzed: de rjes gto ra mas mchod par bya //
translated: After that, one should make offerings with the torma.

original: lte bar chos kyi 'byung gnas bsam //
analyzed: lte bar chos kyi 'byung gnas bsam //
translated: In the navel, imagine the source of phenomena.

original: de nas sngags kyi 'khor lo 'bar //
analyzed: de nas sngags kyi 'khor lo 'bar //
translated: Then the blazing wheel of mantra

original: steng nas g-yo ba'i rlung dgug cing //
analyzed: steng nas g-yo ba'i rlung dgug cing //
translated: Draws up the wind of movement from above.

original: rdza mkhan 'khor lo shes rab 'khor //
analyzed: rdza mkhan 'khor lo shes rab 'khor //
translated: The potter's wheel is the wheel of wisdom.

original: rnam par rtog pa rlung drod kyi //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa rlung drod kyi //
translated: The wind of conceptual thought

original: 'byung ba'i dangs snyigs phyed 'gyur bas //
analyzed: 'byung ba'i dangs snyigs phyed 'gyur bas //
translated: Separates the pure and impure elements.

original: mar me la sogs rtags rnams 'byung //
analyzed: mar me la sogs rtags rnams 'byung //
translated: Signs such as a butter lamp and so forth arise.

original: des skyo phyi nang lha mchod la //
analyzed: des skyo phyi nang lha mchod la //
translated: Dissatisfied with that, offer to the outer and inner deities,

original: bstod cing dge ba bsngo bar bya //
analyzed: bstod cing dge ba bsngo bar bya //
translated: Praise, and dedicate the virtue.

original: bdag gis sgrub thabs bris pa las //
analyzed: bdag gis sgrub thabs bris pa las //
translated: From the virtue of my writing this sādhana,

original: dge ba gang yod mdun byas te //🔽'gro ba rigs drug rnal 'byor ma'i //
analyzed: dge ba gang yod mdun byas te // 'gro ba rigs drug rnal 'byor ma'i //
translated: Whatever exists,🔽May the six types of migrating beings go to enlightenment🔽By the path of Yoginī.

original: lam nas byang chub 'gro bar shog / dpal rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i sgrub thabs /
analyzed: lam nas byang chub 'gro bar shog / dpal rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i sgrub thabs /
translated: The sādhana of glorious Vajrayoginī

original: rje d'i pam ka ra shr'i dzny'a nas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: rje d'i pam ka ra shr'i dzny'a nas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
translated: composed by Lord Dānapālaśrījñāna is complete.

original: // / pandi ta de nyid dang / lo ts'a ba rgya brtson 'grus seng ges bsgyur ba'o//
analyzed: // / pandi ta de nyid dang / lo ts'a ba rgya brtson 'grus seng ges bsgyur ba'o//
translated: It was translated by the paṇḍita himself and the translator Rwa Lotsāwa.
